entry.title: A Practicing Project Called Party_bid Is Around the Corner
entry.content:
PartyBid, a practicing project is around the corner.

From this project we can get,and which marked “<_” is ensensial.

  • Known to OS and web

    • Commandline

      • GUI Enhance
        • TotalTerminal
        • iTerm
      • Command Enhance
        • zsh
      • Command HotKey
        • Jump : Ctl+a,Ctl+e,Option

    • Web Develop Application

      • Local

        • Editor & IDE
        • Vim, MacVim
        • RubyMine, WebStorm <_
        • Atom,Sublime Text, Textmate
        • Note & Doc
          • Dash
          • Evernote
        • Debug Tools
          • Chrome browser <_
            • Inspect Element
            • Console
            • LocalStorage

      • Website

        • Tools <_
          • git: github, gitcafe
          • trello
          • google
        • Library
          • Com.CodeForDream <_
            • AngularJS
          • Cn.AngularJS
          • Com.CodeAcademy
            • Javascript
        • &FAQ
          • Com.StackOverFlow

  • Code Skill Practiced <_

    • PartyBid
      • StoryBoard
      • Refactor
    • GuessNumber
      • Kata
  • Thought
    • Clean Code [XP]
    • Refactor <_
    • TDD [ Test Driven Develop ] <_
    • “Well”,“Less Well”,“?” | “Action”, Get After
